title: sadbhakthiyu galga
sahitya:
sadbhaktiyu galga jEsi santasilli brOvumayya

anupallavi

 tatpUrvamu daityEcuniviDaliccina santAna rAma

caraNam

 bhAnukOTi sankAshA bhava bandhamu vidipincu shrInivAsuDagu shrIdharashrtajana paripAla

madhyamakAlam

dhEnu nIdu vaibhavamula kAnuTakikamu vaccitinimAnaka nI nAyaNTi dInulaku bhirAna sadaya
